## AutoheightParams.reinitHeightOnViewportWidthChange property

When a width change is detected on viewport, the height of the `WebView` will be set to `undefined` for a few milliseconds. This will allow the best handling of height constraint in edge-cases with, for example, content expanding vertically (display: flex), at the cost of a small flash.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
reinitHeightOnViewportWidthChange?: boolean;
```
